dAppRequest_login_subtitleKnownDapp: %s is requesting you to login with a Persona.
dAppRequest_login_subtitleNewDapp: %s  is requesting you to login for the first time with a Persona.
dAppRequest_accountPermission_subtitle: *%s* is requesting permission to *always* be able to view account information when you login with this Persona.
dAppRequest_accountPermission_updateInSe: You can update this permission in your settings at any time.
dAppRequest_chooseAccounts_successMessag: You are now connected to %s. You can change your preferences for this dApp in your Settings at any time.
dAppRequest_chooseAccountsOneTime_subtit: *%s* is making a one-time request for at least %d accounts.
*%s* is making a one-time request for any number of accounts.
*%s* is making a one-time request for at least 1 account.
*%s* is making a one-time request for at least %d accounts.
*%s* is making a one-time request for 1 account.
dAppRequest_chooseAccountsOngoing_subtit: Choose at least %d accounts you wish to use with *%s*.
Choose any accounts you wish to use with *%s*.
Choose at least 1 account you wish to use with *%s*.
Choose %d accounts you wish to use with *%s*.
Choose 1 account you wish to use with *%s*.
dAppRequest_personalDataOneTime_subtitle: *%s* is requesting that you provide some pieces of personal data *just one time*
dAppRequest_personalDataPermission_subti: *%s* is requesting permission to *always* be able to view the following personal data when you login with this Persona.
dAppRequest_personalDataPermission_updat: You can update this permission in your Settings at any time.
dAppRequest_requestMalformedAlert_messag: Interaction received from dApp does not contain any valid requests.
dAppRequest_requestPersonaNotFoundAlert_: Persona specified by dApp does not exist.
dAppRequest_requestWrongNetworkAlert_mes: Request received from dApp for network %@, but you are currently connected to %@.
dAppRequest_responseFailureAlert_message: Failed to send response payload back to dApp.
dAppRequest_metadataLoadingAlert_message: Danger! Bad dApp config or you're being spoofed!
